name: Grave Connections
description:
A game about befriending ghosts and making connections (through bullets!) 

Programming/UI by Atiya Nova (linkedin), art by Kodey Owen (instagram)

Instructions: 

👻 Arrow keys/WASD to move

👻 Mouse to aim

👻 Click to shoot

👻 Hit ghosts with correct bullets to collect them—opposites attract!

👻 Once a ghost becomes your buddy, they can shoot too... 👀

Free assets used: Handpainted Forest Pack

Free font: Pretty Girl Font

Free music: Minor Angst by Dee Yan-Key
